response.explain: The previous action code was to cook the steak on the stove. There was no execution error, which means the steak has been cooked successfully. Now, we need to move on to the next subtask, which is to put the cooked steak on the plate.
response.subtask:
(1) Open the fridge
(2) Take the steak out of the fridge
(3) Move to the stove
(4) Put the steak on the frying pan
(5) Cook the steak on the stove
(6) Grasp the cooked steak from the frying pan
(7) Move to the plate
(8) Put the cooked steak on the plate
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 6: Grasp the cooked steak from the frying pan
    steak = registry(env,"steak_201")
    EasyGrasp(robot, steak)
    donothing(env)
